agenda_item: Commission legislative and work programme (2005) (continuation of debate)
summary_english:
Looking at this parliamentary speech, I can see that it consists only of a procedural announcement indicating that Mr. Ouzký (Vice-President) has taken the chair. This is purely an administrative/procedural statement with no substantive content related to the Commission legislative and work programme debate.
